item.title: [DISTRELEC-7870] Export USD add2cart on product detail page
item.description:
Begin forwarded message:
From: "Vaisvilaite, Ausra" <[1]ausra.vaisvila@elfa.se>
Subject: RE: Export: urgent issue to fix on the webshop
Date: 30 Sep 2015 16:59:10 CEST
To: Evangelos Kontopoulos <[2]e_kontopoulos@infosysconsulting.com>, "Haemmerli, Rene" <[3]rene.haemmerli@distrelec.com>, "Kraft, Marc" <[4]marc.kraft@distrelec.com>
Cc: "Skora, Sebastian" <[5]sebastian.skora@distrelec.com>

Dear Evangelos, If I understand the suggested below is 2 step action for one solution, right?Either way, the proposed below sounds good for us and I hope its easy to make change. Should I make changes in this issue in Sharepoint? I can see that in Jira this is ticket no. 7779. I from my side will work on sustainable solution to maintain PR00 prices in USD going forward.  Kind regards,Ausra VaisvilaiteHead of Sales CEE region and ExportDistrelec B.V.
+46 767 218603[6]www.distrelec.biz   From: Evangelos Kontopoulos [[7]mailto:e_kontopoulos@infosysconsulting.com] 
Sent: 30 September 2015 16:36
To: Vaisvilaite, Ausra; Rassat, Thibaud; Haemmerli, Rene; Kraft, Marc
Cc: Skora, Sebastian
Subject: RE: Export: urgent issue to fix on the webshop Hello Ausra,As we discussed the problem comes in the detail page where we didn’t want to allow items without pricing to be added into the cart. @Rene,Marc here the case I think is a bit different and there is indeed exist a price for the sales organization in EUR but not for the customer who is in USD.As currently we don’t have an ideal solution since the prices are not maintained in USD in SAP I see two options that we could adjust there:1.       Check if price exist in the shop based on the sales org setup 7801 is in EUR so if EUR price is found in HMC then allow to add to the cart2.       We activate the add to cart button for every item and give an error when price response from SAP is 0. What do you think? Unfortunately in SAP you are allowed to add a product without price and only during the save would give you an information message. Regards,EvangelosFrom: Vaisvilaite, Ausra [[8]mailto:ausra.vaisvila@elfa.se] 
Sent: 30 September 2015 15:54
To: Rassat, Thibaud; Evangelos Kontopoulos
Cc: Kraft, Marc; Skora, Sebastian; Haemmerli, Rene
Subject: RE: Export: urgent issue to fix on the webshop Dear all, How does the issue with currency is related with possibility to add product to shopping cart while being in it? We are ok with the fact that customer sees USD price only in shopping cart for as long as prices in other currencies are not maintained by Pricing team.  Kind regards,Ausra VaisvilaiteHead of Sales CEE region and ExportDistrelec B.V.
+46 767 218603[9]www.distrelec.biz   From: Rassat, Thibaud 
Sent: 30 September 2015 15:46
To: Evangelos Kontopoulos
Cc: Kraft, Marc; Skora, Sebastian; Vaisvilaite, Ausra; Haemmerli, Rene
Subject: RE: Export: urgent issue to fix on the webshop Dear Evangelos, We do have a lot of USD customers in our system.It should convert automatically from the EUR pricelist into USD (in the shopping cart). We know that there is no PR00 pricelist in USD, only in EUR. Regards, Thibaud From: Evangelos Kontopoulos [[10]mailto:e_kontopoulos@infosysconsulting.com] 
Sent: den 30 september 2015 14:37
To: Rassat, Thibaud
Cc: Kraft, Marc; Skora, Sebastian; Vaisvilaite, Ausra; Haemmerli, Rene
Subject: RE: Export: urgent issue to fix on the webshop Dear Thibaud,This is not an issue on the Webshop. SAP export prices to the Webshop. As we have agreed during the design phase Webshop prices are only shown in other currencies in two cases:1.       Someone in SAP has maintained prices in foreign currencies e.g. USD2.       Item gets into the cart where an automatic conversion takes place and value is shown. I had a look in the system and I saw no PR00 maintained in USD dollars and this is the reason why in the detail page of an article you cannot see any prices.If price managers decide to maintain prices also into other currencies then you will automatically see the USD dollar prices there. Please let me know for further help. Regards,Evangelos  From: Haemmerli, Rene [[11]mailto:rene.haemmerli@distrelec.com] 
Sent: 30 September 2015 14:29
To: Evangelos Kontopoulos
Cc: Kraft, Marc; Skora, Sebastian; Rassat, Thibaud
Subject: Re: Export: urgent issue to fix on the webshop Hello Evangelos   This is a USD customer, can you please help here?  ThanksRené 
René Hämmerli.Team Lead E-Platform DevelopmentDistrelec Group Inc. On 30 Sep 2015, at 12:31, Rassat, Thibaud <[12]Thibaud.Rassat@elfa.se> wrote: Every products that i try have the same issue once logged in to this customer account: 300118291102580311036394 Etc Regards, Thibaud RassatExport Key Account ManagerElfa Distrelec AB / Distrelec B.V.Phone: +46 8 580 941 42Mobile:+46 727 498 473Email: [13]Thibaud.rassat@elfa.se[14]www.distrelec.biz <image001.jpg>   From: Haemmerli, Rene 
Sent: den 30 september 2015 11:22

Cc: Kraft, Marc; Skora, Sebastian
Subject: Re: Export: urgent issue to fix on the webshop Hello Thibaud Can you please provide us the products where you have problem? I tried also several ones with you customers login and the button is always visible: Art.Nr.  30012152 Art.Nr.  30012149- Art.Nr.  11035097- Art.Nr.  11035098 RegardsRené <image002.png>   [15]http://www.distrelec.biz/en/hf-test-lead-bnc-100-cm-black-telegaertner-000-10a-1803/p/11035098?q=test&page=9&origPos=28&origPageSize=25&simi=99.78

item.summary: Export USD add2cart on product detail page

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please check why the online-price for USD customers in the export shop is not working.
Note: The online price is used only on the product details page.

Note: The online price is used only on the product details page.

I am aware of that, but since they are not going to maintain price-lists in USD, this seems to be the best solution.
There was a request to not display USD prices on Export shop.

After enabling online prices for customers with the flag "onlinePriceCalculation" set to true, I noticed that the prices are based on what we have in hybris. My fix retrieves online prices even if we don't have prices in hybris for the used currency.
Next step: extends the WSDL to get also the unit when getting the online price.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7867] NPS - Send E-Mail Rule
item.description:
The rules of sending an E-Mail to the countries is today:

  • If Free Text then send E-Mail otherwise not

An additional rule should be added for the "detractors" (unhappy customers), the E-Mail should be sent to the countries if the score is between 0 and 6 even if it is without free text comment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7854] Create content slot on default page template for content below the catalog browse categories
item.description:
In order to place content below the catalog browse categories on the left side we need to add a new content slot on the default page template.

Within this slot we should be able to add following components:

  • Distrelec Link List Component
  • Distrelec Linked Image Component
  • Simple Banner Component
  • Paragraph

We can then work with Component Restrictions within the Context Visibility to only show some of the components on specific pages (e.g. category page XY)
item.summary: Create content slot on default page template for content below the catalog browse categories

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7841] Layout alignment- change width of carpet, hero teaser, direct order
item.description:
In order to finally harmonise the alignment of the homepage elements we will change the sizes of the following three elements to the values mentioned next to it:

  • DistExtHeroRotatingTeaserComponentThreeQuarters: 715x200px
  • DistExtCarpetItem: 225x300px
  • DirectOrder: 225x200px

In order to make sure that the carpet teasers can be changed gradually to the new format we will scale the width of all existing teasers within the carpet items from 220x300px to 225x300px as an intermediate solution.

Please also change the product image container within the automated carpet items to the new width of 225px.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7838] Add MISSING PARAM: AddrState for paypal payment when shipping address is in USA and Canada
item.description:
Hi Neeraj,

This is regarding PayPal and the parameter <AddrState>.
This parameter is mandatory for addresses in USA and Canada. Sample transaction:

<PayID>c7577aa5cadc4679972590d00c199c49</PayID><MID>pg_59414</MID><TransID>8821797519364</TransID><Method>Client</Method><Type>PayPal</Type><AID></AID><RefNr>00709E36150903023313</RefNr><Currency>EUR</Currency><AmountAuth>0</AmountAuth><AmountCap>0</AmountCap><AmountCred>0</AmountCred><Created>03.09.2015 02:33:16</Created><Changed>03.09.2015 02:33:19</Changed>

<Code>20150970</Code><Status>MISSING PARAM: AddrS</Status>
<FullDescription>MISSING PARAM: AddrState</FullDescription>

The address codes should be taken from the PayPal API reference:
https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/classic/api/state_codes/

Please note that PayPal matches if the <AddrCity> is located in the state submitted.

Our technical reference has to be updated in regards of this field.

Best regards
Till
item.summary: Add MISSING PARAM: AddrState for paypal payment when shipping address is in USA and Canada

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Dev complete

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6919] Movex - Punchoutfilter update issue
item.description:
The punchout filter update is probably not updating properly.
Similar problem like for the EOL issue.

If for example a file is sent to the shop which contains all the punchouts for a customer, then the second time a product is not included anymore in the punchouts then it should be removed from hybris. At the moment this only works if the valid to date is younger than today.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Implementation in trunk:
1. delete all punchouts
2. import all punchouts
3. run the sync job
I will clarify with the ERP team if they exporitng everytime all punchouts.

We require more inputs on Punchout filter update.

1, Is it incremental file or full load file.
2. If it is incremental file and the product is not included in punchout but exist in system and date is also valid then
i. Shall we delete all existing records data from punchoutfilter.
ii. if require to delete few products, then what is the valid criteria for deletion.

Hi Nitin

Once per day they send a FULL export.

Cheers
Will

Hi Will,

Please provide me more information on below -
1. How many files as ERP providing for PunchoutFilter load. I have seen two files erp_punchoutfilt_cu and erp_punchoutfilt_man. Please provide me other files for test the code changes.
2. I have observed below ITEM TYPE in distrelecB2Bcore-items.xml
a. DistPunchOutFilter
b. DistProductPunchOutFilter
c. DistSalesOrgPunchOutFilter
d. DistCUPunchOutFilter
e. DistCTPunchOutFilter
f. DistCOPunchOutFilter
g. DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter
I believe erp_punchoutfilt_man file belongs to DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter TYPE and erp_punchoutfilt_cu file belongs to DistCUPunchOutFilter TYPE. We will delete the records from particular TYPE based on file type. Please confirm on my understanding.
3. It seems it`s not Full load for PunchoutFilter, it is incremental load and full load for specific TYPE. Please confirm.

Many Thanks,
Nitin Deshmukh

Hi Nitin

The punchout API is defined by 4 files in the distrelecB2Bcore-spring-integration-erp.xml:

	<bean id="erpPunchOutFilterCOConverter" class="de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.converter.impl.DefaultImpexConverter">
		<property name="header">
			<value>#{erpImpexImportHeader}
				# Insert/Update country punch-out-filter
				INSERT_UPDATE DistCOPunchOutFilter[processor=com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.processor.LastModifiedErpImportProcessor];salesOrg(code)[unique=true];country(isocode)[unique=true];product(code,$catalogVersion)[unique=true];productHierarchy[unique=true];validFromDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];validUntilDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];lastModifiedErp[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss]
			</value>
		</property>
		<property name="impexRow">
			<value>;{+0};{+1};{2};{3};{+4};{+5};{+6}</value>
		</property>
		<property name="type" value="DistCOPunchOutFilter" />
	</bean>

	<bean id="erpPunchOutFilterCTConverter" class="de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.converter.impl.DefaultImpexConverter">
		<property name="header">
			<value>#{erpImpexImportHeader}
				
				# Replace SAP codes by hybris codes:
				$customerTypeCodeMapping=[cellDecorator=com.namics.hybris.toolbox.impex.text.MultiReplaceTextDecorator][mapping-delimiter=->][replace-mapping0=Z100->B2B][replace-mapping1=Z200->B2C][replace-mapping2=COMPANY->B2B][replace-mapping3=PRIVATE->B2C]
				
				# Insert/Update customer type punch-out-filter
				INSERT_UPDATE DistCTPunchOutFilter[processor=com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.processor.LastModifiedErpImportProcessor];customerType(code)[unique=true]$customerTypeCodeMapping;product(code,$catalogVersion)[unique=true];validFromDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];validUntilDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];lastModifiedErp[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss]
			</value>
		</property>
		<property name="impexRow">
			<value>;{+0};{+1};{+2};{+3};{+4}</value>
		</property>
		<property name="type" value="DistCTPunchOutFilter" />
	</bean>

	<bean id="erpPunchOutFilterCUConverter" class="de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.converter.impl.DefaultImpexConverter">
		<property name="header">
			<value>#{erpImpexImportHeader}
				# Insert/Update customer punch-out-filter
				INSERT_UPDATE DistCUPunchOutFilter[processor=com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.processor.LastModifiedErpImportProcessor];salesOrg(code)[unique=true];erpCustomerID[unique=true];product(code,$catalogVersion)[unique=true];productHierarchy[unique=true];validFromDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];validUntilDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];lastModifiedErp[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss]
			</value>
		</property>
		<property name="impexRow">
			<value>;{+0};{+1};{2};{3};{+4};{+5};{+6}</value>
		</property>
		<property name="rowFilter" ref="customerRowFilter" />
		<property name="type" value="DistCUPunchOutFilter" />
	</bean>
	
	<bean id="erpPunchOutFilterManufacturerConverter" class="com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.batch.converter.impl.DefaultDistImpexConverter">
		<property name="header">
			<value>#{erpImpexImportHeader}
				# Insert/Update customer punch-out-filter
				INSERT_UPDATE DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter[processor=com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.dataimport.processor.LastModifiedErpImportProcessor];salesOrg(code)[unique=true];erpCustomerID[unique=true];manufacturer(code)[unique=true];validFromDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];validUntilDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];lastModifiedErp[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss]
			</value>
		</property>
		<property name="impexRow">
			<value>;{+0};{+1};man_{+2};{3};{+4};{+5}</value>
		</property>
		<property name="beforeEachConverting" ref="beforeEachPunchOutFilterManufacturer" />
		<property name="type" value="DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter" />
	</bean>

We get every night a FULL export for each punchout type (that means 4 FULL export files). At the moment we only have data for two types, as you could only find 2 files.

You delete now the all the records according the file / punchout type. Thats the way to do it

If you want, we can do a quick review session in the afternoon.

Thx
Will

I have validate the code changes with DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter file and it`s seem working fine but observed some data configuration related issue in DistCUPunchOutFilter file. Due to this system not importing DistCUPunchOutFilter file into the local system.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6307] SEO - Duplication - Pagination on Category pages
item.description:
Observations :

  • Since December 2014, category product results page are displayed with a pagination to display product :
    Exemple : On http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/Instruments-de-mesure/Oscilloscopes/Oscilloscopes-num%C3%A9riques-%C3%A0-m%C3%A9moire/c/cat-29061
    A link to every results pages is done :
    http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/Passive-Components/Resistors/Precision-Resistors/Precision-Resistors-SMD/Precision-Resistors-ERJL,-1210,-0-33-W,-1%-SMD/c/cat-322629&page=1
  • Those links lead to an http 400 for the bots
  • Those links are functional for the users (js).

Impacts :

  • We are wasting google bot crawl frame time on http 400 pages.
  • We don't let google bot discover the products inside category paginated pages.
  • We don't provide a relationship model between pagination pages and category pages.
  • When google is not crawling correctly the category he can't discover naturraly the products.

Demands :

  • Correct the pagination links on every category pages results.
    example : http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629&page=1 (400) corrected into http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?page=1 (200)
  • Redirect in 301 the faulty category page to the right one.
    example : http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629&page=1 =301> http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?page=1
  • Insert inside the <head> of category pages with multiple results pages "next/prev" meta tags (https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/1663744?hl=en)
    example :
    • For a category page without multiple results pages : no meta tags
    • For a category page, paginated as number 1 (distrelec.xx/*/c/id or http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat_id?page=1) :
      url : http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629
      <link rel="next" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?page=2">
    • For a category page, paginated as number 2 (distrelec.xx/*/c/id?page=2) :
      url : http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?page=2
      <link rel="prev" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629">
<link rel="next" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?page=3">
    • For a category page, paginated as number 3 (distrelec.xx/*/c/id?page=3) :
      url : http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?page=3
      <link rel="prev" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?page=2">
<link rel="next" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?page=4">
    • For the last paginated page of a category (distrelec.xx/*/c/id?page=lastpage) :
      url : http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?page=lastpage
      <link rel="prev" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?page=lastpageN-1">
  • Create a 301 redirection for the pagination "page=1" to the root.
    example :
    http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?page=1 =301> http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629

Checking process :

  • Need to be verify locally by PHUBERT
  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - Duplication - Pagination on Category pages

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

the link

  • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?page=1
    redirects to:
  • http://www.distrelec.ch/en/components/passive-components/resistors/precision-resistors/precision-resistors-smd/precision-resistors-erjl-1210-33-smd/c/cat-322629

What exactly is wrong?

The issue is on the parameter.
If you add it at the end of a category page it's not redirected.
Exemple :
http://www.distrelec.ch/en/components/passive-components/resistors/precision-resistors/precision-resistors-smd/precision-resistors-erjl-1210-33-smd/c/cat-322629?page=1 200
Expected behavior :
http://www.distrelec.ch/en/components/passive-components/resistors/precision-resistors/precision-resistors-smd/precision-resistors-erjl-1210-33-smd/c/cat-322629?page=1 =301> http://www.distrelec.ch/en/components/passive-components/resistors/precision-resistors/precision-resistors-smd/precision-resistors-erjl-1210-33-smd/c/cat-322629

Pierre-Francois Hubert | Distrelec: what is the expected behavior when we have "page=1" and some other query parameters?
e.g., http://www.distrelec.ch/en/components/passive-components/resistors/precision-resistors/precision-resistors-smd/precision-resistors-erjl-1210-33-smd/c/cat-322629?page=1&pageSize=10

Unless it create side effect, this is the expected behavior :

  • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?page=1&pageSize=10 =301> http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?pageSize=10
  • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629?page=1=301> http://www.distrelec.ch/*/c/cat-322629
In the new implementation, when the "page" parameter equals to "1", then I redirect with 301 to the same URL with all parameters, if any, except the "page" parameter.
Perfect ! I'll try that on Q when it's going to be deployed.
Deployment to Q will be done this evening.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6096] CH-OCI Hilti encoding
item.description:
Hallo und guten Tag Herr Bühler,
ich wurde von Hilti kontaktiert, dass wir wieder erneut ein Encoding Problem mit den Umlauten innerhalb des Distrelec Webshops haben.

Sie erinnern sich wahrscheinlich, dass wir dieses Problem schon vor einiger Zeit hatten. Seit der Umstellung der Webshop URL, liegt das Thema nun wieder vor. Ich habe den Checkout geprüft und den Parameter gefunden welcher dieses Problem unterdrücken sollte:

charset[1] utf-8

Allerdings sollte der Parameter wie folgt übergeben werden:
charset utf-8

können Sie bitte diese Änderung veranlassen?

Mit freundlichen Grüßen / Best regards
Sabine Reuter

Sabine Reuter | Capgemini BPO | IBX Business Network
Supplier Service Management

Tel.: +49 69 9515 - 2367 / Mobil: +49 175 578 6369
Berliner Str. 76 / 63065 Offenbach am Main, Germany

supplier@ibxplatform.com

www.capgemini.com/procurement / www.ibxplatform.com

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
What exactly should be defined for this customer?
I saw there is no configuration regarding the encoding for him.

as field configuration the Parameter get's [1].. [2].... on all articles
And ibx needs a fixed Parameter once without "[n]"

added the configuration again. but maybe it is possible to ad a global paramater without []

What is:
"Zeichencodierung vom Bestell Formular:"

Hi Oliver,
This is a OCI standard definition and we have to change the core if we want this configuration.
The numbers are needed because there could be more as one product in the response.

See anwer from customer. Problem has to be solved.

Hallo Herr Sautter,

ja das Problem ist leider immer noch vorhanden.
Frau Wirnsberger von Hilti hat dies bestätigt.
Können sie in den OCI Parametern folgte Ergänzung einbringen?

Name
charset

Value
utf-8
Dies könnte auf dem schnellsten Wege vielleicht das Problem beheben.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen / Best regards

Sabine Reuter

______________________________________________________________

Sabine Reuter | Capgemini BPO | IBX Business Network

Supplier Service Management

Tel.: +49 69 9515 - 2367 / Mobil: +49 175 578 6369

Berliner Str. 76 / 63065 Offenbach am Main, Germany

supplier@ibxplatform.com

www.capgemini.com/procurement / www.ibxplatform.com

Oliver,
This is not a standard value.
The customer is using SAP right?

This parameter will not solve the encoding problem.

I think the customer means a meta attribut change. Not the form parameters. And we have the meta <meta charset="UTF-8">.

I saw you have not activated the HTML encoding in the OCI configuration.

Hallo Herr Sautter,

hier ist nochmal sabine Reuter von IBX wegen dem Encoding Problem. Auch die andere Einstellung hat leider keine Änderung ergeben. Ich habe das ticket nochmals an unsere Techniker weitergeleitet, daher die späte Rückmeldung.
Mein kollege hat sich das problem nochmals angesehen und das folgende festgestellt:

Der Webshop sendet die folgenden Parameter:
~OkCode ADDI
~Caller CTLG
~Target _top
NEW_ITEM-DESCRIPTION[1] Labornetzgerät 360 W 30 VDC @ 1 mV
NEW_ITEM-MATNR[1]

NEW_ITEM-PRICEUNIT[1] 1
NEW_ITEM-CURRENCY[1] CHF
NEW_ITEM-LEADTIME[1] 1
NEW_ITEM-VENDOR[1] L1005322
NEW_ITEM-VENDORMAT[1] 912160
NEW_ITEM-MANUFACTCODE[1]
NEW_ITEM-MANUFACTMAT[1]
NEW_ITEM-CONTRACT[1]
NEW_ITEM-CONTRACT_ITEM[1]
NEW_ITEM-SERVICE[1]
NEW_ITEM-EXT_QUOTE_ID[1]
NEW_ITEM-EXT_QUOTE_ITEM[1]
NEW_ITEM-EXT_PRODUCT_ID[1]
NEW_ITEM-LONGTEXT_1:132[]
NEW_ITEM-ATTACHMENT[1]
NEW_ITEM-ATTACHMENT_TITLE[1]
NEW_ITEM-ATTACHMENT_PURPOSE[1] C
NEW_ITEM-EXT_CATEGORY_ID[1]
NEW_ITEM-EXT_CATEGORY[1]
NEW_ITEM-ZZ_PROCESS_TYPE[1] GREEN
NEW_ITEM-CUST_FIELD1[1] 32000000
charset[1] utf-8
NEW_ITEM-DESCRIPTION[2] Lötspitze konisch 0.4 mm
NEW_ITEM-MATNR[2]
NEW_ITEM-MATGROUP[2]
NEW_ITEM-QUANTITY[2] 1.000
NEW_ITEM-UNIT[2] EA
NEW_ITEM-PRICE[2] 7.340
NEW_ITEM-PRICEUNIT[2] 1
NEW_ITEM-CURRENCY[2] CHF
NEW_ITEM-LEADTIME[2] 1
NEW_ITEM-VENDOR[2] L1005322
NEW_ITEM-VENDORMAT[2] 961816
NEW_ITEM-MANUFACTCODE[2]
NEW_ITEM-MANUFACTMAT[2]
NEW_ITEM-CONTRACT[2]
NEW_ITEM-CONTRACT_ITEM[2]
NEW_ITEM-SERVICE[2]
NEW_ITEM-EXT_QUOTE_ID[2]
NEW_ITEM-EXT_QUOTE_ITEM[2]
NEW_ITEM-EXT_PRODUCT_ID[2]
NEW_ITEM-LONGTEXT_2:132[]
NEW_ITEM-ATTACHMENT[2]
NEW_ITEM-ATTACHMENT_TITLE[2]
NEW_ITEM-ATTACHMENT_PURPOSE[2] C
NEW_ITEM-EXT_CATEGORY_ID[2]
NEW_ITEM-EXT_CATEGORY[2]
NEW_ITEM-ZZ_PROCESS_TYPE[2] GREEN
NEW_ITEM-CUST_FIELD1[2] 32000000
charset[2] utf-8

Das Problem ist, dass Sie charset[1] und charset[2] senden mit dem Wert utf-8.
Der Parameter sollte nur einmal gesendet werden als einziger Parameter pro Einkaufswagen:
charset UTF-8

Könnten Sie dies bitte nochmals prüfen lassen, ob diese Einstellung möglich ist in Ihrem Hause?

Mit freundlichen Grüßen / Best regards

Sabine Reuter

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4596] SEO - Duplication - Between categories - rel="canonical" to add
item.description:
Observations :

  • Category level 4 and 5 are identical in 17% of the case (verified by an entire crawl of distrelec.ch), Exemples :
    • level 4 (Composants/ Protection de circuits/ Fusibles et disjoncteurs pour appareils/ Disjoncteurs) :
      http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/Protection-de-circuits/Fusibles-et-disjoncteurs-pour-appareils/Disjoncteurs/c/cat-L3D_530341
    • level 5 (Composants/ Protection de circuits/ Fusibles et disjoncteurs pour appareils/ Disjoncteurs / Disjoncteurs) :
      http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/Protection-de-circuits/Fusibles-et-disjoncteurs-pour-appareils/Disjoncteurs/Disjoncteurs/c/cat-24893
    • New observation (07/10/15) : any level can be concerned by this duplication.

Impacts :

  • This bug create pure DUST (Different URLs, Similar Text) duplicate.
  • That lead into duplication of content on our biggest landing pages, waste of crawl and finally not be ranked properly inside the search engine result pages for the expression targeted by those pages.

Demands :

Two options to fix this issue (choices 1 strongly prefered) :

  • Option 1 :
    • Every time the category title and the number of product of the lvl5 is identical to the level 4,
      the level 5 must redirect in 301to the level 4.
      A dynamic ruel should be implemented, if absolutetly not possible, a static list of redirection should be provided.
    • Exemple with level 5 http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/Protection-de-circuits/Fusibles-et-disjoncteurs-pour-appareils/Disjoncteurs/Disjoncteurs/c/cat-24893 :
      • category title level 4 = "Disjoncteurs" ; category title level 5 = "Disjoncteurs"
      • count product level 4 = "189" ; count product level 5 = "189"
        -> http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/Protection-de-circuits/Fusibles-et-disjoncteurs-pour-appareils/Disjoncteurs/Disjoncteurs/c/cat-24893
        =301> http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/Protection-de-circuits/Fusibles-et-disjoncteurs-pour-appareils/Disjoncteurs/c/cat-L3D_530341
  • Option 2 :
    • Every time the category title and the number of product of the lvl5 is identical to the level 4,
      the level 5 must have a canonical tag leading to the absolute url of level 4 in the html head.
    • Exemple with level 5 http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/Protection-de-circuits/Fusibles-et-disjoncteurs-pour-appareils/Disjoncteurs/Disjoncteurs/c/cat-24893 :
      • category title level 4 = "Disjoncteurs" ; category title level 5 = "Disjoncteurs"
      • count product level 4 = "189" ; count product level 5 = "189"
        -> level 5 must contain the tag : 
        <link rel="canonical" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/Protection-de-circuits/Fusibles-et-disjoncteurs-pour-appareils/Disjoncteurs/c/cat-L3D_530341" />

  • New demand (07/10/15) : apply this test and redirections (option 1)on any levels (except lvl2 vs lvl1 & lvl3 vs lvl2)

Checking process :

  • Need to be verify locally by PHUBERT
  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - Duplication - Between categories - rel="canonical" to add

comments.comment:
Development has been done!!
All the scripts has been updated and impex file too. I have reconfigured the warehouse manualy on P & Q system.

Results can be seen here too http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/Warehouse+configuration+-+production

It seems the stock is still not displayed in the shop.
Example for DE shop:
30019168;EF51;53;20151009;0;20151008070045
Example for PL shop:
11061592;ES71;64;20151011;0;20151008070045
11061592;ES71;1338;20151018;0;20151008070045

This Information was sent at 11:24 today morning in the file: erp_stock-20151008112314061.csv_20151008122316021

Could you check this, please?

Hello Urs Bebie | Distrelec

When I checked on the webshop I found the same information present of the webshop for example see this:-

Stock for 30019168
But when I check the shop, no stock is displayed. See screenshots.

Hi Urs Bebie | Distrelec :-
Yes you are right. I too can see the same on the shop. It has wrong availability information on flyout.

This means we have correct stock level in hybris, but the display logic is not correct some how.

Hello Urs Bebie | Distrelec :- I digged deep into this and figure out that stock level information is being displayed on the web by two ways.

  1. For Movex :- We are displaying the stock level based on the file send by ERP. like the one you attached with jira task.
  2. For Sap :- There is an online sap interface for this called IF06_Availability This interface is basically responsible for displaying correct stock information. The webshop is sending the list of all available warehouse and display the information which is coming as a response.

I can see the response is zero for all warehouse available in the DE shope. Here is the request & response for this article.

Request to SAP
===========

 <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:hyb="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <hyb:AvailabilityRequest xmlns:ns2="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
         <salesOrganization>7350</salesOrganization>     
         <articleNumbers>30019168</articleNumbers>        
         <warehouseIds>EF51</warehouseIds>
          <warehouseIds>ES51</warehouseIds>
           <warehouseIds>7371</warehouseIds>
      </hyb:AvailabilityRequest>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

Response from SAP
===========

    <SOAP:Envelope xmlns:SOAP="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
   <SOAP:Header/>
   <SOAP:Body xmlns:hyb="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
      <ns1:AvailabilityResponse xmlns:ns1="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
         <erpArticleAvailability>
            <articleNumber>30019168</articleNumber>
            <articleFound>true</articleFound>
            <stockLevels>
               <warehouseId>EF51</warehouseId>
               <available>0</available>
               <articleFoundInWarehouse>false</articleFoundInWarehouse>
            </stockLevels>
            <stockLevels>
               <warehouseId>ES51</warehouseId>
               <available>0</available>
               <articleFoundInWarehouse>false</articleFoundInWarehouse>
            </stockLevels>
            <stockLevels>
               <warehouseId>7371</warehouseId>
               <available>0</available>
               <articleFoundInWarehouse>true</articleFoundInWarehouse>
            </stockLevels>
         </erpArticleAvailability>
      </ns1:AvailabilityResponse>
   </SOAP:Body>
</SOAP:Envelope>

Hello Evangelos Kontopoulos | Lodestone :-

Can you please check the above request / response and figure out why we have a zero stock level for article no 30019168 for DE shop.

Thanks

Hello Neeraj,
The ES and EF codes are not ERP codes. These are custom values we use when we export the stock. These codes cannot be used in the direct requests in SAP and is only for display there.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6495] Mega Fly Out // Import
item.description:
Please update the MegaFlyout on the Q-System now with the attached File.
When the update on Q was successful, please forward this mail to the person in CC.

Next steps:
1) You will update the MegaFlyout in Q-System using the attached file
2) You will inform the person in CC when the update is done
3) The person in CC will check in the Q-System if the update was as expacted
4a) if the person in CC replay the mail with "not approved", the person will start a new process. - So for you is the process end.
4b) if the person in CC replay the mail with "approved", the person will advise you to import the same file in the P-System.
5) if you have updated the P-System successful, inform the person in CC.
6) Ther person in CC will proof the P-System.
7a) if the person in CC replay the mail with "not approved", you have to find out with him, why and solve it!
7b) if the person in CC replay with "approved", the person will inform all needed persons including you. - For you is the process done. - Thank you!
